name: Animancer Adept Training
button_tooltip: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Animancers</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Unseen Veil</> ability.

name: Animancer Master Training
button_tooltip: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Animancers</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Dark Prophecy</> ability.

name: Scorched Earth
button_tooltip: Allows the <UnitName>Archangel's</> <Bold>Meteor Strike</> ability to set the ground on fire on impact, dealing 20 damage per second to enemy ground units over 10 seconds.

name: Celestial Hyperdrive
button_tooltip: Increases the movement speed of <UnitName>Arcships</>, <UnitName>Arcstations</>, <UnitName>Arcfortresses</>, and <UnitName>Morph Cores</> by 50%.

name: Longshot Module
button_tooltip: Increases the range of the <UnitName>Argent's</> weapons by +<d ref=\"ArgentRangeUpgrade.set_values[0].target_value\"/> and damage by 25%.

name: Plasma Arc Infusion
button_tooltip: Grants <UnitName>Atlases:</>\r\n\r\n<Bold>On-Hit:</> Lights the ground on fire, dealing 20 damage per second to all units for 5 seconds.

name: Radiant Fury
button_tooltip: Improves the <UnitName>Kri's</> <Bold>Blaze of Light</> ability, increasing damage done by 20 (+20 vs Light) and allowing Kri to move when they take fatal damage before they explode.

name: Cabal Adept Training
button_tooltip: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Cabals</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Gravity Flux</> ability.

name: Cabal Master Training
button_tooltip: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Cabals</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Mind Shackle</> ability.

name: Infernal Fury
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Brutes</> to use the <Bold>Infernal Fury</> ability and increases their movement speed by <d ref=\"ChargeSlam_BuffSpeed.modifiers[0].amount\"/>%.

name: Covert Bombers
button_tooltip: <Bold>Bombers</> launched from the <UnitName>Helicarrier</> gain permanent Stealth.

name: Darkness Spreads
button_tooltip: Permanently increases all <Bold>Shroud</> coverage by 50%.

name: Resolute Seal
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Seraphims</> to use the <Bold>Resolute Seal</> ability.
Grants <UnitName>Exos:</>\r\n\r\n<Bold>On-Attack:</> Gains 25% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

name: Skysprint Retrofit
button_tooltip: Increases the movement speed of <UnitName>Evacs</> by 25%.

name: Inner Demons
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Fire Giants</> to use the <Bold>Release Inner Demons</> ability, allowing them to spawn Enflamed Imps on-death.

name: Flame Extension
button_tooltip: Improves the <UnitName>Fire Giant's</> attack, allowing it to combust an additional 2 times in a straight line.

name: Flame On
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Imps</> to use the <Bold>Flame On</> ability.

name: Reaper's Rush
button_tooltip: Increases the movement speed of <UnitName>Gaunts</> by 35%.

name: Soulbrand Chakrams
button_tooltip:
Grants <UnitName>Gaunts</>:

<Bold>On-Hit:</> If this unit is in <Bold>Shroud</>, targets are <Bold>Cursed</>.

<AttackCallout>Cursed units take damage over time and spawn a Phantom if they die.</>

name: Research Hexen Adept Training
button_tooltip: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Hexens</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Venom Trap</> ability.

name: Hexen Master Training
button_tooltip: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Hexens</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Miasma</> ability.

name: Seismic Slam
button_tooltip: Improves the <UnitName>Harbinger's</> <Bold>Descend</> ability, allowing it to stun surrounding enemy ground units for 2 seconds and increases Harbinger's <Bold>Shroud</> coverage by 100%.

name: Molten Touch
button_tooltip: Grants <UnitName>Hellbornes:</>\r\n\r\n<Bold>On-Hit:</> Lights the target on fire, reducing healing received by 90% and dealing 10 damage per second for 5 seconds.

name: Demonhoof Tremors
button_tooltip: Allows the <UnitName>Magmadon's</> <Bold>Trample</> ability to periodically stun nearby enemy ground units.

name: Kinetic Redirection
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Lancers</> to increase their attack and movement speed each time they're damaged.

name: Raging Tendons
button_tooltip: Increases the movement speed of <UnitName>Magmadons</> by 30%.

name: Mass Infiltration
button_tooltip: Improves the <UnitName>Graven's</> <Bold>Infiltrate</>, allowing it to disable multiple structures in a moderate area around the target structure.

name: MedTech Master Training
button_tooltip: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>MedTechs</> and allows them to use the <Bold>System Shock</> ability.

name: Transonic Rockets
button_tooltip: Increases the range of the Deployed <UnitName>Hedgehog's</> anti-air weapon by +4 and the Mobilized Hedgehog's anti-ground weapon by +2.

name: Mitigative Guard
button_tooltip: Grants the <UnitName>Lancer</>:\r\n\r\n<Bold>On-Damaged:</> Damage reduced by 2.

name: Fiendslopsion
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Brutes</> to spawn an additional Fiend when it perishes, including when they <Bold>Sunder Soul</>.

name: MedTech Adept Training
button_tooltip: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>MedTechs</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Nanoswarm</> ability.

name: Sentinel Adept Augmentation
button_tooltip: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Sentinels</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Hastebot Dispersal Aura</> passive ability.

name: Sentinel Master Augmentation
button_tooltip: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Sentinels</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Nano-defense Bubble</> ability.

name: Peak Performance
button_tooltip: Fully powers up the <UnitName>Vulcan's</> weapon after it uses <Bold>Jump Jets</>.

name: Pounce
button_tooltip: Grants <UnitName>S.C.O.U.T.s</> the <Bold>Pounce</> ability, allowing them to gain speed and deal bonus damage while initiating an attack against enemy units.

name: Recall
button_tooltip: Increases the movement speed of <UnitName>Vectors</> by 30% and allows them to use the <Bold>Recall</> ability after Delta Jumping, returning them to their previous location.

name: Roll Out
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Kri</> to use the <Bold>Roll Out</> ability, increasing its movement speed when not attacking.

name: Core Ascendency
button_tooltip: Improves the effectiveness of the <UnitName>Saber's</> <Bold>Mass Accelerator</> and <Bold>Self-Repair</> abilities by 200%.

name: Salivary Overflow
button_tooltip: Increases the maximum potency of <UnitName>Spriggan's</> <Bold>Binding Saliva</> from 30% reduction to 60%.

name: Vorillium Claws
button_tooltip: Improves the <UnitName>S.C.O.U.T's</> bonus damage against Light units by +8 damage.

name: Pyric Touch
button_tooltip:
Grants <UnitName>Maloc</> and <UnitName>Burned Ones</>:

<bold>On-Hit:</> Target takes +1 damage from Maloc or his Burned Ones' attacks.

Max +50 damage. Cannot be applied to structures.

name: Divebomb
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Shadowflyers</> to use the <Bold>Divebomb</> ability.

name: Heavenstep
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Argents</> to use the <Bold>Heavenstep</> ability.

name: Overcharge Amplifier
button_tooltip: Increases the damage, armor, and construction speed bonuses given by <Bold>Servo Overcharge</> by 100%.

name: Survival Protocol
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Exos</> to negate fatal damage once every 120 seconds.

name: Tensor Pulse
button_tooltip: Allows the <UnitName>Scythe's</> weapon to deal 100% bonus damage to air units within 4 range.

name: Tag
button_tooltip: Allows <UnitName>Scanners</> to use the <Bold>Tag</> ability.
